itemDisplayName: Create an app to call Microsoft Graph and ARM APIs
description: This template configures an app with OAuth2.0 scopes to call Microsoft Graph and ARM APIs. It creates a client application and grants OAuth2.0 scopes to the client application. The deployer can select which Microsoft Graph OAuth2.0 scopes are used.
summary: This template configures an app with OAuth2.0 scopes to call Microsoft Graph and ARM APIs.
